entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:11 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain and a few flurries changing to a few rain showers and flurries late this evening then to a few flurries after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
